TopicTitle: My ship icon location on map is missing.

Articles.Content: I was Orbiting Kerbin messing with the nodes to fix my trajectory and my ship icon is now missing. I can still see my apoapsis and periapsis and can make nodes but i cant seem to get my icon back, not sure what i did. I backed out to the main menu and reloaded the save and it is still gone. Maybe i have to restart the whole game but i was curious if there was a button to toggle it, i hit a lot of the keys but didn't seem to do anything.
The most common reason for this problem is you've filtered it out. Move your mouse to the top of the screen and make sure the ship icon isn't dark.

I didnt even realize that was there, but from what i noticed when i moved my mouse to the top was a bar just telling me were things were and clicking them didn't do anything.

- - - Updated - - -

Thanks for the help tsotha i figured it out thanks to you.
